pages.text: You can process this cluster by combining it with an earth charge to make silver dust, or by heating it with a blaze burner, seperating the stone out in a centrifuge, and then quenching it in water, salt water, or plant oil, depending on what you want out.$(br) Quenching in water results in one to two of each of the materials produced by the uncommon cluster, in crushed form, and two to five redstone.

Quenching in sea water yeilds zero to two crushed iron and tin, one crushed silver, and between one and two crushed nickel.$(br)   Finally quenching in plant oil will give zero to two crushed copper and aluminum and one crushed zinc.$(br)$(br)   You can also crush this cluster to get out a powdered form that, when planted mixed into bonemeal and planted, causes special flowers to grow.
